posts.title: 2020 Golden Globes movie winners: 1917 and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood win best motion picture
posts.excerpt: Netflix is the biggest disappointment of the night with the most nominations and zero wins

posts.title: 2020 Golden Globes movie nominations: Netflix in the lead with four nominations for best picture
posts.excerpt: Noah Baumbach's Marriage Story leads with five nominations, followed by Scorsese's The Irishman, and Fernando Meirelles's The Two Popes.

posts.title: Margaret Atwood and Bernardine Evaristo are the winners of The Booker Prize 2019
posts.excerpt: Judges break the rules with a double win by two authors in this year's announcement.

posts.title: Meet the five books in the shortlist for The Booker Prize 2019
posts.excerpt: The shortlist for The Book Prize 2019 includes the latest from Margaret Atwood and Salman Rushdie, among others. Meet the finalists and get on reading.

posts.title: Five prestigious book awards to help you find your next great book to read
posts.excerpt: Book Awards can be a source of great book recommendations. Here are five prestigious book awards to keep in mind.

posts.title: 2019 Venice Film Festival winners include the new Joker movie and Roman Polanski
posts.excerpt: Todd Phillips's Joker got the Golden Lion for best movie; Roman Polanski won the Grand Jury Prize for An Officer And A Spy. See all competition winners of 2019's Venice Film Festival.

posts.title: The 2019 Hugo Awards Winners
posts.excerpt: The winners of this year's awards include Mary Robinette Kowal's The Calculating Stars and Martha Wells's Artificial Condition.
